definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Is 30:20 teacher;—abs. in [[אֵלוֹן מוֹרֶה]] Ge 12:6 (J) = [[אֵלוֹנֵי מׂרֶה]] De 11:30 (Sam LXX [[אֵלוֹן]]), the teacher's terebinth (see [[אֵלוֹן]]) near Shechem; cf. [[גִּבְעַת הַמּוֹרֶה]] Ju Jdg 7:1 teacher's hill near the plain of Jezreel, prob. Little Hermon, Nebî Daḥî Bd:Pal 244; the terebinth being a holy tree from which divine teaching was given, and the hill of the teacher the seat of a holy place whence divine teaching was given; see also (of God) Job 36:22; here belong prob. likewise [[מוֹרָָי]] Pr 5:13, and [[מוֹרֶיְ]] Is 30:20, Is 30:20.
